TEXT.TITLE: DUCOMMON INC <DCO> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 5.60 dlrs vs loss 1.10 dlrs Oper net loss 18,688,000 vs loss 3,662,000 Sales 107.3 mln vs 108.7 mln Year Oper shr loss 5.76 dlrs vs loss 98 cts Oper net loss 19,213,000 vs loss 3,263,000 Sales 455.2 mln vs 417.0 mln Note: Prior qtr and year figures exclude losses from discontinued operations of 279,000 dlrs and 555,000 dlrs, respectively and respective losses on sale of discontinued operations of 14.6 mln dlrs and 15.9 mln dlrs.
